Name: Hovershift
About the game: Test your reflexes with Hovershift and get the highest score Press left or right to control the hovercraft. Avoid deadly obstacles and collect coins and items. Hovershift is a simple but very exciting game that suits people of all ages! Characteristics Trendy voxel graphics. 20 integrated hovercraft ready to be unlocked with coins. Daily reward system Arcade atmosphere Best score saved
